body.name: Joylux - SHEbar, Feminine Cleansing Bar, Yoni Bar, pH-Balanced Formula, Clean & Gentle Ingredients, Velvety Texture, Light Mandarin Scent, Rich in Essential Oils (3.2oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 15 mins
features: GENTLE CLEANSER: Yoni bars are formulated especially for the vaginal area. This cleansing bar is french-milled for a richer & more luxurious lather that is light & velvety, & won't leave residue behind.

RICH LATHER: Shebar is gently formulated for the intimate tissue, absorbing gently into skin to thoroughly cleanse & nourish your intimate tissue. It can be used all over the body to keep you feeling fresh & confident all day.

CLEAN INGREDIENTS: This non-soap cleanser has avocado oil to help soothe itchy skin, & coconut oil to promote lasting hydration. It also contains argan oil, which has anti-aging properties to help improve elasticity in intimate skin.

THE HER INTIMATE CARE LINE: We do not use parabens, propylene glycol, mineral oils, phthalates, petrochemicals, PEG, synthetic dyes, or alcohol. We do use ingredients that are clean, balanced, healthy, powerful, & effective.

MOTHERHOOD THROUGH MENOPAUSE: Our goal is to undo the stigma around women's intimate wellness, & embrace our bodies at every stage of womanhood. Our line of wellness products helps women of every age to have increased comfort, confidence, & control.
body.description: Our Inspiration After becoming a mother, I experienced firsthand everything that women deal with post-delivery and with age. I’m not talking about weight gain, but rather the changes that occur with our intimate health. Frustrated by the lack of effective and affordable solutions, I took my experience as a medical aesthetic entrepreneur and partnered with Dr. Sarah, Ob-Gyn to create a line of products that improve all aspects of women’s intimate health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this soap
reviews.reviewText: Will be ordering this soap again.LeftMeSmelling clean and feeling clean for at least 24 hours.Wish there was a lotion to use afterwards that smelled the same

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to Queen V bar...
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, lathers great, doesn't leave residue, does the job. I got this because the queen v bars were out of stock. This is a good alternative for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soothing and gentle
reviews.reviewText: This soap (SHEbar) is for Vaginal or overall use. Great for sensitive areas of the body. It has a very, very soft fragrance.I like that because fragrances can be irritating on very sensitive areas. This soap is very mild and soothing to the skin. It is quite pricey for just one bar of soap. I paid 11.00 for it, so hopefully it will last for a reasonable amount of time. I ordered it just for my Yoni. I might order it again, we'll see. It is good though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Is super gentle soothing soap
reviews.reviewText: It works well. Super soothing. Bought it twice. But the size is small. It lasted me 2 weeks top. Because if the creamy not dry texture it literally shrink every time you use till it disappears at day 16 of usage.It also makes such enormous residue in the bath that you have to clean the bath tub with degreasing solution after the shower every single time other wise you can easily slip next time you take the shower.Small is really ok. Don’t love it, is on the cheaper soap smell side but is really ok. Not bad. Not strong. I think it works well but I will look to sub it in the next 2 weeks for something which lasts longer than 15 days and does not give so much work to clean 🧼 the bath tub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Queen v
reviews.reviewText: I get so many compliments on my coochie when I use this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 😡 Titanium dioxide, really???!!!
reviews.reviewText: That's the opposite of what you want for your body let alone somewhere as sensitive as a labia. I noticed some other questionable ingredients as well. Shame on them. At least they seem to allow returns but honestly this kind of nonsense makes it expected. I guess makes me feel better I can return it since I can't give less than one star. People need to pay attention to what they put in and on their bodies. My goodness, have self respect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells like Love Spell. IYKYK.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something gentle and did not expect to open the packaging and be completely bombarded with a super strong fragrance. My entire apartment smells like this bar of soap. If that’s not your jam, this is probably not for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a must have❣️
reviews.reviewText: I don’t necessarily notices sent but it’s extremely creamy the bar when wet it’s very creamy and moisturizing and it doesn’t leave any residue and it must work miracles with the pH balance because trust me you will notice it it’s wonderful I’ve already ordered another one and I haven’t even got halfway through this far I just don’t wanna be caught without it now that I have it out you will love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Very gentle on skin and smells nice
reviews.reviewText: Very nice scent, creamy and lathers well.Very gentle on skin.

I bought this. Was so excited to try. Wanted something nice for something personal.Just self careIt stung so bad. !!!!Then hurt again when I went to bathroom.This is not for your intimate area.I will only use as a normal soap.But at this price. Would never normally buy it for a soap.Beware. 🥹

reviews.reviewTitle: SHEBar is the best ‘she bar’ ever!
Good as a body bar, wouldn't use it for intimate wash again. Irritated likely due to coconut.
reviews.reviewText: I like the bar. It does a good enough job at cleaning my skin without drying it out. I did however start getting some type of irritation after using it only on my labia. To be fair, I have issues with coconut oil on my skin and most products that contain coconut oil don't bother me, but this is the first time using anything with coconut oil on my intimate areas. So if you are someone who has trouble with coconut oil, I'd go for something else. I can't fault the bar for something I have issues with.As for cleansing my body, as I mentioned, it did a good job without drying my skin out at all. I find it smells pretty good. I am not sure if it is supposed to have pieces of grit in it, but at times I feel like there is something in it.Honestly, I'm just going to stick to either gel based intimate washes or Dove bars. I have had no issues with it.
